title: تَعَدُّد الْخَبَر وَأَحْكَام الْحَذْف
description: Learn about تعدد الخبر (multiple predicates for one subject) and أحكام الحذف (rules for deleting مبتدأ and خبر).

notes.title: Multiple Predicates (تعدد الخبر)
content: A single مُبْتَدَأ can have multiple أَخْبَار (predicates), all describing the same subject. Each خَبَر is مَرْفُوع.
Example: زَيْدٌ عَالِمٌ كَرِيمٌ شُجَاعٌ - Zayd is learned, generous, brave. All three are خَبَر for زَيْد.

examples.english: He is the First, Last, Manifest, Hidden

notes.title: تعدد الخبر vs. العطف
content: تَعَدُّد الخَبَر differs from عَطْف (conjunction). In تعدد, no conjunction is needed; in عطف, وَ joins separate predicates.
زَيْدٌ عَالِمٌ كَرِيمٌ (تعدد - no conjunction) vs. زَيْدٌ عَالِمٌ وَكَرِيمٌ (عطف - with conjunction).

notes.title: Permissible Deletion of المبتدأ
content: المُبْتَدَأ can be deleted جَوَازًا (permissibly) when context makes it clear. Common in answers: كَيْفَ زَيْدٌ؟ (هُوَ) مَرِيضٌ.
The deleted element is estimated (مُقَدَّر) in analysis: مبتدأ محذوف تقديره هو.

notes.title: Obligatory Deletion of المبتدأ
content: المُبْتَدَأ must be deleted وُجُوبًا in certain structures: after نِعْمَ/بِئْسَ in some analyses, القَسَم (oath responses), and المَخْصُوص بالمدح/الذم.
In these cases, the مبتدأ cannot be explicitly stated.

examples.english: In my conscience (is a vow) I will do
By your life (is my oath) he is truthful

notes.title: Permissible Deletion of الخبر
content: الخَبَر can be deleted جَوَازًا when the context indicates it. Common in answers: مَنْ فِي الدَّارِ؟ زَيْدٌ (فِي الدَّارِ).
The predicate is understood from the question or context.

examples.english: Who is in the house? Zayd (is in the house)

notes.title: Obligatory Deletion of الخبر
content: الخَبَر must be deleted وُجُوبًا after لَوْلَا (if not for): لَوْلَا زَيْدٌ (مَوْجُودٌ) لَهَلَكْتُ. The خبر is always مَوْجُود or كَائِن.
Also obligatory with القَسَم: لَعَمْرُكَ (قَسَمِي), and some other structures.

examples.english: If not for Zayd, I would have perished
If not for water, we would have died
By your life, I will do it
